attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We, the undersigned object to the short listing of the Northern Meeting Park, Ardross St, Inverness, as the site for the proposed new Art Gallery/Museum. We deplore the potential loss of the Northern Meeting Park as an area for organised sport and call upon the Council & Government to support  unequivocally the long term use of the Northern Meeting Park as a venue for organised sport and recreation.
